Text: Awesome!  Many thanks for your efforts to spread the wealth in these dark days.
Beautiful!!! u da man! If some slots don't open up at the hub, I'll come here tomorrow.
Ah, it warms my heart to see DCP again. With thanks to all the hard working scanners & DarkElf for putting it all together.
Good old DCP. If only everyone were as reliable. Thanks again for your tireless efforts. Forget the Juggernaut. You guys are the only thing in comics that can't be stopped.
Too many leechers T_T
This is great. Thanks  Darkelf  :)
thanks

Nice....great to see DCP with its full content.
Don't know what i'll do without ya
Dark Times indeed to read comics online.  !st demonoid, now z-cult cant post dc or marvel comics, and i hear on dec 11th injunctions will be served to piratebay =/  WHERE WE WE GET OUR COMICS!
why is there only 1 seeder? please seed

is anyone else having problems with this torrent?

I show 0 seeders and have never shown more than 1 seeder all night long.....I am only trying to get 3 comics out of this pack and have had it running non-stop all night and I can't get anything......its not like I am a leech either......

anyone?
What should a man do without the onderful DCP. Been really worried for not being able to read the wonderful Cable&Deadpool. Big thank you to scanners and The Darkelf.

1 seeder can be quite normal on this torrent during the first day or two. You forget that things have been in an uproar with Z-Cult's recent problems. Most likely a lot of people have been unable to get the files from other sources to help the torrent along. Be patient.

This is a great way for me to get US comics since i live in Sweden... Altho i do always buy the Swedish Marvel comics here its nice to be able to get the American ones as well wich isnt without hassle here in Sweden.
thanks for the heads up, i guess i am just used to the old demonoid/zcut speeds right away....

A big thanks to the Elf for this!  You Rock man!

God, I hope the Demon finds a new home soon...
There's nothing I need here, but I thought I'd say a big THANK YOU on behalf of other DCP followers everywhere (and following Z-Cult's recent events).

I'm also having problems with this torrent.  I'm using BitComet and even though it's been running for 3 days straight, I'm still at 0.0%.  Has anyone else had this problem?  Any thoughts?  All my PB comic torrents have read 0 seeders for the past 72 hours.
